items.title: EU suspends approval of US trade deal over Greenland threats
items.description: The move follows renewed tensions between the US and EU, as Donald Trump pushes to acquire Greenland.

items.title: Lords back UK social media ban for under-16s
items.description: It comes as the government looks into its own potential ban, with a consultation closing in the summer.

items.title: Seven more countries agree to join Trump's Board of Peace
items.description: Seven Muslim-majority countries publicly accept an invitation to Trump's new organisation, joining Albania, Bahran, Hungary, Morocco and Israel.

items.title: Ghislaine Maxwell to testify before US Congress in Epstein probe
items.description: The convicted sex trafficker has previously said she would decline to answer questions unless she is granted immunity.

items.title: 'Canada lives because of US', Trump digs at Carney in Davos speech
items.description: The US president also takes aim at France's President Macron and a "repetitive" Swiss leader.
